newsitem.title: USA: IMM currency futures cut gains late, most end up.
newsitem.headline: IMM currency futures cut gains late, most end up.

text.p: Aug 21 - IMM currency futures cut gains late, most ended up. Yen, Swiss francs fell most late, with one fund selling 800 Sept yen on the close and pushing it to day's low. Opinions divided over whether Buba will cut on Thursday after strong IFO index. Yen fell overnight when Japanese consumer finance firm filed for bankruptcy. Swiss up on safe-haven buying. -Derivatives Desk(312)408-8750/E-mail:derivatives@reuters.com
